tool_description: A server that can handle request without cors problem to the steam api. You can simply pass your steam api-key to the request to get desired result. All requests are cached (expires in 24h).
name: Steam API client access
title: Steam API client access

api_list.name: Get Game information by app ID
api_list.description: Retrieve a complete game information object simply by passing an app id (you can find app id with the /getOwnedGames or /getRecentlyPlayedGames endpoints of this api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-api-client-access.p.rapidapi.com/gameDetails/30"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-api-client-access.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-api-client-access.p.rapidapi.com/gameDetails/{appid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-api-client-access.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
